field.name: description
field.value:
I have written this enhancement to NVelocity that can retrieve enums in a more "intuitive" way then the previously supported way, consider the following pseudo code (c is context):
public enum EnumData { VALUE_1, VALUE_2, VALUE_3 } c.Put("EnumData", typeof(EnumData) ); c.Put("enumValue", EnumData.VALUE_2 );
Right now you can say:
#if($enumValue == "VALUE_2") equal #end
But with this patch you can now say:
#if($enumValue == $EnumData.VALUE_2) equal #end
More intuive in my opinion (no magic strings), and enum name is prefixed for increased readability.
This patch contains the required change plus a modified test case.
